moduleMetadataJson.name: Applocker Evasion - Microsoft Workflow Compiler
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will assist you in evading Microsoft
         Windows Applocker and Software Restriction Policies.
         This technique utilises the Microsoft signed binaries
         Microsoft.Workflow.Compiler.exe to execute user supplied code.
author: Nick Tyrer <@NickTyrer>
Matt Graeber

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module
